text: Michele De Pascale (born 20 January 1985 in Cesena) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Ravenna on 21 June 2016. He has also served as President of the Province of Ravenna since 4 August 2016. ==See also== *2016 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Ravenna ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Ravenna Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians Category:Presidents of the Province of Ravenna
title: Michele De Pascale
